data.description:
Your mission - should you choose to accept it - is to dive into the immersive realm of Mixed Reality where you'll step foot on the Red Planet, commanding your very own rover through its rugged terrain. Equipped with tasks, adventures and off-script surprises, this app offers an unparalleled experience for both AR/VR novices and seasoned explorers alike.

Unleash your inner astronaut as you navigate the Martian landscape, completing thrilling missions and uncovering hidden wonders along the way. From towering mountains to deep canyons, every corner of Mars holds secrets waiting to be discovered. But beware, challenges and obstacles lie ahead, testing your skills and determination at every turn.

But that's not all! Mars Rovin’ is packed with delightful surprises, just waiting for intrepid explorers to uncover. From elusive alien artifacts to whimsical Martian creatures, the possibilities are endless. And for those who dare to venture deeper, secret features and bonuses await, rewarding those who are bold enough to seek them out.

So, strap in and get ready for the adventure and world of imagination. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned space enthusiast, Mars Rovin’ promises an unforgettable journey to the red planet and beyond.

changelog.change_log:
This content update celebrates the launch of Mars Rovin’ on the Meta Horizon store with the all-new rover customization mode!

* Build your very own rover by combining different wheels, engines and camera components

* Take your rover for a quick test drive by pressing A in the build mode

* Drive the customized rover around through all the different terrains to learn more about Mars!
